alert.note: Alert for Camp; Cass; Marion; Morris; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:31AM CDT until June 13 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southern Morris County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Titus County in northeastern Texas... North central Camp County in northeastern Texas... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 730 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cason, or 7 miles northeast of Pittsburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Daingerfield, Linden, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Omaha, Cason, Cookville, Jenkins, Rocky Branch, Fairview, Avinger, Red Hill, Roeder and Harvard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
